curam.util.client.domain

Interface ClientDomain

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Domain, PlugInContainer<Domain>, java.io.Serializable

    public interface ClientDomain
extends Domain
    Extends the basic Domain interface to provide access to client-specific plug-ins.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Locale GENERIC_LOCALE
      The locale that will be used when the domain definition options in the UML model are parsed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DomainConverter getConverter()
      Gets the converter plug-in used to translate values in this domain to and from string representations.
      DomainConverter getConverter(java.util.Locale locale)
      Gets the converter plug-in used to translate values in this domain to and from string representations.
      org.w3c.dom.Node toNode()
      Returns a summary of the domain information as a DOM element node.

      • Methods inherited from interface curam.util.common.domain.Domain

        getHeritablePlugIn, getPlugIn, getRootDomain, isDescendant, isDescendant

      • Methods inherited from interface curam.util.common.plugin.PlugInContainer

        getChildren, getName, getParent, getPlugIn

    • Field Detail

      • GENERIC_LOCALE

        static final java.util.Locale GENERIC_LOCALE
        The locale that will be used when the domain definition options in the UML model are parsed. This is not the same as the active locale for the plug-in that will be used when formatting the values. This locale should also be used when directly invoking the generic parser routines.

    • Method Detail

      • getConverter

        DomainConverter getConverter(java.util.Locale locale)
                      throws DomainException
        Gets the converter plug-in used to translate values in this domain to and from string representations. In the client domain hierarchy, all domains must have a converter or inherit a converter and it is a critical error if one is not available.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale in which the converter will operate.
        Returns:
        The converter for the domain.
        Throws:
        DomainException - If the converter cannot be found.

      • getConverter

        DomainConverter getConverter()
                      throws DomainException
        Gets the converter plug-in used to translate values in this domain to and from string representations. In the client domain hierarchy, all domains must have a converter or inherit a converter and it is a critical error if one is not available.
        Returns:
        The converter for the domain.
        Throws:
        DomainException - If the converter cannot be found.

      • toNode

        org.w3c.dom.Node toNode()
                 throws DomainException

        Returns a summary of the domain information as a DOM element node. The node represents a "domain" element with the following attributes:

        • "name" - The name of this domain.
        • "code-table-name" - The name of the associated code-table, if any.
        • "parent-domain" - The name of the parent domain of this domain, if any.
        • "root-domain" - The name of the ultimate ancestor domain of this domain, if any.
        Returns:
        A node containing basic information about the domain.
        Throws:
        DomainException - If there is an error creating the node (probably due to missing configuration information for the code-table name option).
